original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca lakkhaṇo āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca lakkhaṇaḥ āyasmā ca mahāmoggallānaḥ gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yenāyasmā lakkhaṇo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena āyasmā lakkhaṇo tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam lakkhaṇam etat avoca
āyāma āvuso lakkhaṇa rājagaham piṇḍāya pavisissāma ati

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paccassosi.
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho āyasmā lakkhaṇaḥ āyasmataḥ mahāmoggallānassa paccassosi

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṁ padese sitaṁ pātvākāsi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ aññatarasmin padese sitam pātvā akāsi

original: Atha kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmā lakkhaṇaḥ āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam etat avoca

original: “ko nu kho, āvuso moggallāna, hetu ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho āvuso moggallāna hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ sitassa pātukammāya ati
akālaḥ kho āvuso lakkhaṇaḥ etassa pañhassa

original: Bhagavato maṁ santike etaṁ pañhaṁ pucchā”ti.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ mama santike etam pañham pucchāti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ca lakkhaṇo āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā ca lakkhaṇaḥ āyasmā ca mahāmoggallānaḥ rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhatta

original: piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā
analyzed: piṇḍapāta paṭikkantāḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamiṣu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā

original: ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho āyasmā lakkhaṇaḥ āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam etat avoca

original: “idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṁ padese sitaṁ pātvākāsi.
analyzed: idha ayasman mahāmoggallānaḥ gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ aññatarasmin padese sitam pātvā akāsi

original: Ko nu kho, āvuso moggallāna, hetu ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho āvuso moggallāna hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ sitassa pātukammāya ati

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikam vehāsam gacchanti

original: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā phāsuḷantarikāhi vitudenti vitacchenti virājenti.
analyzed: tam enam gijjhā api kākā api kulalā api anupatitvā anupatitvā phāsuḷantarikāhi vitudenti vitacchenti virājenti
acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho
evarūpaḥ api nāma atta bhāva paṭilābhaḥ bhavissati iti
cakkhu bhūtāḥ vata bhikkhave sāvakāḥ viharanti

original: ñāṇabhūtā vata, bhikkhave, sāvakā viharanti, yatra hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṁ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṁ vā karissati.
analyzed: ñāṇa bhūtāḥ vata bhikkhave sāvakāḥ viharanti yatra hi nāma sāvakaḥ evarūpam ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhim vā karissati

original: Pubbeva me so, bhikkhave, satto diṭṭho ahosi, api cāhaṁ na byākāsiṁ.
analyzed: pubbā iva me saḥ bhikkhave satto diṭṭhaḥ ahosi api ca aham na byākāsi

original: Ahañcetaṁ byākareyyaṁ, pare ca me na saddaheyyuṁ.
analyzed: ahañca itam byākareyya pare ca me na saddaheyyu

original: Ye me na saddaheyyuṁ, tesaṁ taṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
analyzed: ye me na saddaheyyu tesam tam assa dīgharattam ahitāya dukkhāya

original: Eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe goghātako ahosi.
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe go ghātakaḥ ahosi

original: So tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni
analyzed: saḥ tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassa satāni bahūni vassa sahassāni

original: bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena evarūpaṁ
analyzed: bahūni vassa sata sahassāni niraye paccitvā tassa eva kammassa vipāka avasesena evarūpa

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ maṁsapesiṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ.
analyzed: idha aha āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam masapesim vehāsam gacchanti

original: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
analyzed: tam enam gijjhā api kākā api kulalā api anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti

original: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe goghātako ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe go ghātakaḥ ahosi pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ maṁsapiṇḍaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam masapiṇḍam vehāsam gacchanta

original: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
analyzed: tam enam gijjhā api kākā api kulalā api anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti

original: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sākuṇiko ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe sākuṇikaḥ ahosi pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ nicchaviṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam nicchavim purisam vehāsam gacchanta

original: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
analyzed: tam enam gijjhā api kākā api kulalā api anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti

original: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe orabbhiko ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe orabbhikaḥ ahosi pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ asilomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam asi lomam purisam vehāsam gacchanta

original: Tassa te asī uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti.
analyzed: tassa te asī uppatitvā uppatitvā tassa iva kāye nipatanti

original: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sūkariko ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe sūkarikaḥ ahosi pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ sattilomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam satti lomam purisam vehāsam gacchanta

original: Tassa tā sattiyo uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti.
analyzed: tassa tāḥ sattiyaḥ uppatitvā uppatitvā tassa iva kāye nipatanti

original: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe māgaviko ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe māgavikaḥ ahosi pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ usulomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam usulomam purisam vehāsam gacchanta

original: Tassa te usū uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti.
analyzed: tassa te usū uppatitvā uppatitvā tassa iva kāye nipatanti

original: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe kāraṇiko ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe kāraṇikaḥ ahosi pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ sūcilomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam sūcilomam purisam vehāsam gacchanta

original: Tassa tā sūciyo uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti.
analyzed: tassa tāḥ sūciyaḥ uppatitvā uppatitvā tassa iva kāye nipatanti

original: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sūto ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe sūtaḥ ahosi pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ sūcilomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam sūcilomam purisam vehāsam gacchanta

original: Tassa tā sūciyo sīse pavisitvā mukhato nikkhamanti;
analyzed: tassa tāḥ sūciyaḥ sīse pavisitvā mukhataḥ nikkhamanti

original: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sūcako ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe sūcakaḥ ahosi pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ kumbhaṇḍaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam kumbhaṇḍam purisam vehāsam gacchanta

original: So gacchantopi teva aṇḍe khandhe āropetvā gacchati.
analyzed: saḥ te iva aṇḍe khandhe āropetvā gacchati
nisīdantaḥ upi tesu eva aṇḍesu nisīdati

original: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
analyzed: tam enam gijjhā api kākā api kulalā api anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti

original: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe gāmakūṭako ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe gāmakūṭakaḥ ahosi pe

original: Yo ca sibbiyati sūcako hi so,
analyzed: yaḥ ca sibbiyati sūcakaḥ hi saḥ

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ purisaṁ gūthakūpe sasīsakaṁ nimuggaṁ …pe…
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam purisam gūtha kūpe sa sīsakam nimuggam pe

original: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe pāradāriko ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe pāradārikaḥ ahosi pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ purisaṁ gūthakūpe nimuggaṁ ubhohi hatthehi gūthaṁ khādantaṁ …pe…
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam purisam gūtha kūpe nimuggam ubhohi hatthehi gūtham khādantam pe

original: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe duṭṭhabrāhmaṇo ahosi.
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe duṭṭha brāhmaṇaḥ ahosi

original: So kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane bhikkhusaṅghaṁ bhattena nimantetvā doṇiyo gūthassa pūrāpetvā etadavoca—
analyzed: saḥ kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane bhikkhu saṅgham bhattena nimantetvā doṇiyaḥ gūthassa pūrāpetvā etat avoca

original: aho bhonto yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjantu ceva harantu cā’ti …pe….
analyzed: aho bhontaḥ yāvadattham bhuñjantu ca iva harantu ca ati pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ nicchaviṁ itthiṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam nicchavim itthim vehāsam gacchanti

original: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
analyzed: tam enam gijjhā api kākā api kulalā api anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti

original: esā, bhikkhave, itthī imasmiṁyeva rājagahe aticārinī ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esā bhikkhave itthī imasmiyā iva rājagahe aticārinī ahosi pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ itthiṁ duggandhaṁ maṅguliṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam itthim duggandham maṅgulim vehāsam gacchanti

original: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
analyzed: tam enam gijjhā api kākā api kulalā api anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti

original: esā, bhikkhave, itthī imasmiṁyeva rājagahe ikkhaṇikā ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esā bhikkhave itthī imasmiyā eva rājagahe ikkhaṇikā ahosi pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ itthiṁ uppakkaṁ okiliniṁ okiriniṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam itthim uppakkam okilinim okirinim vehāsam gacchanti

original: esā, bhikkhave, itthī kaliṅgassa rañño aggamahesī ahosi.
analyzed: esā bhikkhave itthī kaliṅgassa raññaḥ aggamahesī ahosi
sā issāpaka tā sapattim aṅgāra kaṭāhena pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ asīsakaṁ kabandhaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam asīsakam kabandham vehāsam gacchanta

original: Tassa ure akkhīni ceva honti mukhañca.
analyzed: tassa ure akkhīni ca iva honti mukhañca

original: Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
analyzed: tam enam gijjhā api kākā api kulalā api anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti

original: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe hāriko nāma coraghātako ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave satto imasmiya eva rājagahe hārikaḥ nāma cora ghātakaḥ ahosi pe

original: “Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ bhikkhuṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ.
analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam bhikkhum vehāsam gacchanta

original: Tassa saṅghāṭipi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā, pattopi āditto sampajjalito sajotibhūto,
analyzed: tassa saṅghāṭi pi ādittā sampajjalitā sajoti bhūtā pattaḥ pi ādittaḥ sampajjalitaḥ sajoti bhūtaḥ

original: kāyabandhanampi ādittaṁ sampajjalitaṁ sajotibhūtaṁ, kāyopi āditto sampajjalito sajotibhūto.
analyzed: kāya bandhanam pi ādittam sampajjalitam sajoti bhūta kāyaḥ api ādittaḥ sampajjalitaḥ sajoti bhūtaḥ

original: eso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpabhikkhu ahosi …pe….
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpa bhikkhu ahosi pe

analyzed: idha aham āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantaḥ addasam sāmaṇerim vehāsam gacchanti

analyzed: tassā saṅghāṭi pi ādittā sampajjalitā sajoti bhūtā pattaḥ pi ādittaḥ sampajjalitaḥ sajoti bhūtaḥ

original: kāyabandhanampi ādittaṁ sampajjalitaṁ sajotibhūtaṁ, kāyopi āditto sampajjalito sajotibhūto.
analyzed: kāya bandhanam pi ādittam sampajjalitam sajoti bhūta kāyaḥ api ādittaḥ sampajjalitaḥ sajoti bhūtaḥ

analyzed: ñāṇa bhūtāḥ vata bhikkhave sāvakāḥ viharanti yatra hi nāma sāvakaḥ evarūpam ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhim vā karissati

original: Pubbeva me sā, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerī diṭṭhā ahosi.
analyzed: pubbā iva me sā bhikkhave sāmaṇerī diṭṭhā ahosi

original: Ahañcetaṁ byākareyyaṁ, pare ca me na saddaheyyuṁ.
analyzed: ahañca itam byākareyya pare ca me na saddaheyyu

original: Ye me na saddaheyyuṁ, tesaṁ taṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
analyzed: ye me na saddaheyyu tesam tam assa dīgharattam ahitāya dukkhāya

original: Esā, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇerī ahosi.

original: Sā tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni
analyzed: sā tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassa satāni bahūni vassa sahassāni

original: bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena evarūpaṁ
analyzed: bahūni vassa sata sahassāni niraye paccitvā tassa eva kammassa vipāka avasesena evarūpa
